message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value and the demand I'm seeing, I'm initially offering it at $20,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I could consider letting it go for $17,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $15,000.
